rules_text: {2}: Create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever you create one or more tokens, tap up to one target creature you don't control. It doesn't untap on its controller's next untap step.
